storyInfo: Cecelia hums an old Sarkaz nursery rhyme upstairs, scattering the melody of her song far and wide. The friar, known as the 'Guide' to his people, asks Ezell a question: Why are the Sankta the only ones allowed happiness?

attributes.content: You look horrible. Did you pull an all-nighter?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: He's back. I saw it, and it couldn't have been anyone else... That light... It was Andoain's Arts!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Ah... so that's why you vanished in a puff of smoke yesterday afternoon.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: He came to you directly, though?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: He wasn't there for me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: When I was bringing the mixed-blood girl back to the Basilica... I bumped into a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: A Sarkaz? Now, of all times? And in broad daylight on the streets of Laterano, too?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That's right... I went after the Sarkaz and told Ezell to take the girl back to the Basilica.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I chased the Sarkaz all the way to the edge of Pagus Faber... but Andoain covered her with his Arts and she got away.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: As for Ezell, I thought he'd have made it to the Basilica by the evening.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But he never made it. This is his terminal. It was stuck to the bottom of a vehicle transporting envoys.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Heh, our trainee kid's a good enough actor to fool you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I doubt he was acting. Though it's true that I don't understand why he did it... Maybe... Andoain kidnapped him, too...?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fiammetta, I think you really ought to calm down a little.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm calm. I'm calmer than I've been in the last eight years.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But none of you ever told me what happened the day after I left.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: It was a simple mop-up mission... and it went so much better than we expected...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: All I did was answer a call for backup... I left the rest of you for four hours...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And by the time I got back to the ruins, it was all too late.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I've already told you everything I could.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What exactly did he get from the Lock and Key that gave him the nerve to do that to Lemuen?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I would tell you if I could... but I don't know myself.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Fiammetta, this is Laterano, the Lateran Basilica. We aren't running around ruins in the wilds of Kazdel anymore.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You need to get some rest, Fiammetta. How about I help you apply for some leave? If you don't use your annual leave, it just expires.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Are you serious?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The conference is in two days, and Andoain brought a Sarkaz here to Laterano to kidnap a mixed-blood Sankta girl. He might have even attacked an executor...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I really let my guard down this time... The Sarkaz clearly knew her way around Pagus Faber. They must've infiltrated Laterano a long time ago... What is that maniac planning this time?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm serious. Calm down.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The old man's already heard about the Astray, and so has Velliv. I was working in the Basilica yesterday too—Not that I like to think of meetings as work.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: In any case, Laterano is really not in as much danger as you think. Andoain's just a Sankta. He's not a monster with six eyes and four arms. If you really want to take him on, go lie down for two hours.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We'll talk to Lemuen after that.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Looks like you're not completely out of it just yet.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Did you get enough rest last night?
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: I'm very well-rested. Thank you for taking us in, senior.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The Ecclesia Requietum's doors are always open, as long as you don't find it too depressing.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: After all, both the living and the dead visit this place.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: Given the circumstances, we're fortunate enough to have a roof over our heads. Speaking of which, where is Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The girl you brought with you? The sisters told me that she slept very well last night. She must have been exhausted.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: She's had a long day.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: Mister Ezell, Mister Friar. Good morning.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Good morning, Cecelia. You're full of energy today.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Yeah... We have stuff to do.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I asked Mister Friar to help me with something.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: He told me that... there is a ceremony for the family of the dead... to say their goodbyes.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I want to... say goodbye to Mamma...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: We will hold a funeral for Miss Feoria.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: I see... A funeral...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's both a way to pay the dead our respects and for us to find closure.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: I'll help you, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Allow me to thank you again, senior.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No, not at all. It is my honor, actually.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: There is nothing more beautiful than finding the courage to take that step forward.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: She is still young, and already she is saying farewell to a loved one. Not many grown men can handle this journey she is about to take.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: May I come in?
Oh, it's you. At last.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: Please, come in. She's here.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: It's the singing cotton candy lady!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (Put your gun down. This is a heartfelt reunion.)
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: (It is no different from the countless emotional meetings that have taken place across the land.)
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: I knew it... It's you...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Woman

attributes.content: Cotton Candy Lady, I didn't get to talk to you yesterday.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I actually really, really wanted to! But I don't know why... everyone started to fight...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Your horns look just like Papà's. So pretty!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I wish I had horns like Papà too... I'm jealous.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Hehe... Really? But your halo is very pretty.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Woman

attributes.content: It's so bright that I sometimes can't sleep at night! It helps me read storybooks, though...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cotton Candy Lady, are you from the same place as Papà? Why can't Papà live in the city? Why aren't there other Sarkaz in Laterano?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Oh... My name is Cecelia!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Hello, Cecelia. Call me... Rosella.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Woman

attributes.content: (Friar... Why is there a Sarkaz here?)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: (Sarkaz... No Sarkaz have ever been allowed to set foot in our holy Lateran City.)
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: (But then, what is Cecelia?)
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: (Let's go. Give them some space.)
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: (What are you people trying to accomplish?)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: (We're only... seeking our path forward.)
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: Good morning, Guide.
attributes.name: Devout Follower

attributes.content: Salutations, Guide.
attributes.name: Pondering Follower

attributes.content: May God bless you and keep you, Guide.
attributes.name: Smiling Follower

attributes.content: They call you their guide?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I don't presume to be any sort of guide or leader. You may call me by my name, Andoain.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: If being a leader helps my brothers and sisters feel at ease and points them in a direction, then I am willing to serve as their Guide. That's all.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I hope that's all it is.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I know what you're thinking.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The mastermind of a heretical cult, lurking in the shadows of Laterano to lead its citizens astray. A man plotting a shocking conspiracy during this important conference that the city spent so much time to prepare?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: No, we wish only to throw open the doors.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: To those who are rejected, harmed, insulted, and desecrated.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The Ecclesia Requietum will open its doors to them all.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But both you and I are 'angels.' They are not. The sacred cathedrals and churches of the Sankta have no place for them.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Look at this old man. The Ursus hammering away at the coffin. He lost his family, his friends, his land, and his home during the war. What does he have to rely on, to believe in? Where can he find comfort and salvation?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: After a long journey, he made his way here to Laterano, the land of peace and radiance he heard about from passing travelers.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But what did this place offer him? How did the glorious Lateran City treat this foreigner who had long been a toy of fate's cruelty?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: See the Caprinae woman watering the herbs? She was branded a whore and a blasphemer for offending a noble, only barely escaping her home when it was set alight.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: All she wanted was peace and quiet, or, if fate would allow her a bit of luxury, a brief moment of leisure and joy every now and then. Do you think the saints in the Basilica will think her their sister?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: To these men and women, our glorious Lateran citizens might perhaps offer them a sympathetic smile, perhaps even passionately hear their woes, maybe even open up their wallets to show their kindness and virtue.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Yet, to the Sankta, all of this will always be somebody else's problem.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: As for the Sarkaz, the 'cursed devils,' the 'crafty devils...' The 'devils' have never had a choice.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Our hatred of them has lasted thousands of years. For as long as history books go back, the Sankta and the Sarkaz have been slaughtering one another. The origin of this conflict is long gone. Our mutual hatred has become common sense.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Father and son slay father and son. Sisters murder sisters. The Sarkaz attack Sankta caravans for sport, while the Sankta shoot their Sarkaz enemies through the chest with greatest pride.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: We are only ever concerned with how we see them, yet we are never interested in how they see us. Vengeance for vengeance grew into custom, and those customs eventually became tradition.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But, if you are willing to spend the night with them under the same roof, you will find that their joys and sorrows are no different from ours.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: They rejoice when reunited, they weep when one passes, they tease their friends, and they grow bashful when they fall in love. Some of them love drink, others love song. Some of them even choose to dedicate their lives to their faith.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: How are they any different from us?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: In Laterano, even the most devout Liberi friars who carefully follow the Church's teachings, who dutifully carry out their tasks in each ceremony, even those who are made saints and created cardinals...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The Church has never truly accepted them. The Liberi are only there to lend a helping hand. They are tools to be used in the Church's day-to-day affairs.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: They don't have halos, which means they... heh, they aren't 'chosen,' they aren't Sankta.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Laterano is a place of peace and beauty, a place full of joy and laughter, but only we are deserving of this 'grace.'
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What you're saying... is apostasy.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Young executor, let me ask you. Why—
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Why are the Sankta the only ones allowed happiness?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You know who Cecelia is...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: We've known for years. She's the child of a Sankta and a Sarkaz. If grace actually existed, she would be it.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: So you're trying to kidnap Cecelia now because of the conference?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: We are not concerned with the conference at all.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: We came to take Cecelia now because, as a child, she should be by her mother's side.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: As soon as we are done with what we came here for, we will leave Laterano.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What are you trying to accomplish?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You seem very tense. First things first, we must hold a funeral for Cecelia's mother.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Do you see the place up ahead with all the flowers? That's where the gravesite is. Tomorrow, that's where Feoria will be buried.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: If all are equal when they pass—
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Then so should they be when they live.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Come out.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Executor Federico.

Your Excellency, if I may ask, did you provide the Sarkaz with a path to infiltrate Laterano? If indeed you did, I would be required to take you in to the relevant Tribunal of the Lateran Curia for questioning.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Must we make things so difficult between us?
I suggest you cooperate with the Notarial Hall. Should you resist arrest, regulations stipulate that I can and will temporarily suspend your rights as a Lateran citizen.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: How exactly do you explain this encounter of ours with canon laws and teachings?
Should we interpret it as a test, or does it mean we have lost our way?
Or perhaps... losing our way is part of the test?
It is clear that you are resisting arrest.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Unfortunately, this encounter will not be resolved peacefully.
attributes.name: Federico
